snippet: Got a closet full of great clothes and nothing to wear? Host a swap soirée.
abstract: Got a closet full of great clothes and nothing to wear? Host a swap soirée.
lead_paragraph: Got a closet full of great clothes and nothing to wear? Host a swap soirée. As the actress and writer Shiva Rose and the gallery owner Amy Greenspon can attest, from L.A. to New York, one woman's castoffs are another's must-haves. Additional reporting by Stephanie LaCava and Shiva Rose.
